Read warmup initial state CSV, keep File ID and Altitude, rename to file_id and alt_km.
Iterate over every Swarm-A density CSV whose name contains 2015.
For each file: parse Timestamp column as datetime and keep only rows with year 2015.
Clean Orbit Mean Density column: convert to numeric, drop NaNs, cast to float, discard unrealistically large sentinel values (>1e30).
Keep only observations whose Timestamp time component equals 00:00:00.
Add file_id extracted from the CSV filename and retain Timestamp, file_id, and density.
Concatenate all cleaned per-file dataframes; raise error if none found.
Merge the concatenated density dataframe with the initial-state dataframe on file_id to attach altitude.
Select rows where altitude is between 450 km and 500 km inclusive.
Compute and report the mean of the Orbit Mean Density values in this altitude slice.
